title: Bqool Advertising
pageTitle: Bqool Advertising For Amazon Ads| My Featured Projects
content: BQool Advertising offers intelligent ad management tools to help sellers optimize their ad performance. With AI Bidding, the system automatically adjusts bids based on real-time performance data and Target ACOS to maximize efficiency. Auto-Harvesting streamlines keyword optimization by analyzing daily search term reports, ensuring the most relevant keywords are applied to improve ad results.
role: UX design, UI design, Prototype design,Frontend Design
collaboration: Project Management Team, Research and Development Team

title: Danshan EScholar
pageTitle: Danshan EScholar | My Featured Projects
content: Danshan EScholar APP is an innovative online learning platform designed to provide an immersive English learning experience for young students. By interacting with top students from the U.S., children can enhance their English proficiency and broaden their thinking skills.The app offers a wealth of video learning resources, allowing students to learn anytime, anywhere. Additionally, experienced mentors guide and inspire students, fostering a proactive learning attitude and helping them improve their English skills.
role: UX design, UI design, Prototype design
collaboration: Project Management Team, Research and Development Team

title: DINING(Proposal)
pageTitle: DINING | My Featured Projects
content: DINING is a modern online ordering platform designed to enhance the dining experience. It offers features such as reservation for waiting, allowing customers to book a table in advance. Customers can also place orders online, selecting from the menu and submitting their orders directly. Additionally, the platform supports arranging seating and ordering in the restaurant to optimize dining efficiency. Restaurant management is made easy with tools for handling order preparation, billing, and more, ensuring smooth service and an exceptional dining experience.
collaboration: Product Team, Research and Development Team

title: Elite Scheduling APP
pageTitle: Elite Scheduling APP | My Featured Projects
content: Elite Scheduling APP is an efficient scheduling platform designed for both learners and instructors, offering flexible and convenient course arrangement services. Users can easily check course schedules and teacher availability to quickly make reservations. The platform supports real-time scheduling, adjustments, and notifications, enhancing communication between students and teachers. Whether for individual or group classes, the Elite Scheduling APP provides clear, accurate course arrangements and can tailor content based on the learner’s progress, creating a personalized learning experience. It makes learning more efficient and flexible, saving valuable time for students.
collaboration: Product Team, Research and Development Team

title: FMS Factory Management System
pageTitle: FMS Factory Management System | My Featured Projects
content: FMS Factory Management System is a platform designed to boost factory efficiency, integrating factory management, warehouse management, CRM, and approval management. It provides real-time production line monitoring, helping managers track progress, allocate resources, and improve capacity and efficiency. The warehouse module tracks inventory and material flow, reducing errors and waste. CRM helps manage customer data, track needs, and strengthen sales relationships. The approval management feature streamlines internal processes, improving transparency and efficiency. FMS offers a comprehensive, intelligent management solution for factories
role: User Research,UX design,UI design,Prototype design,Frontend Design

title: ELTA TV APP
pageTitle: ELTA TV APP | My Featured Projects
content: ELTA TV APP is a multimedia platform offering a wide range of programs, allowing users to watch live and on-demand content from it anytime, anywhere. Whether it’s sports events, variety shows, news, or popular dramas, ELTA TV provides an HD viewing experience. Users can easily browse various programs on their mobile devices and enjoy up-to-date content options. The app also supports features like playback and fast forwarding, ensuring that you never miss any exciting moments. It’s a must-have app for TV enthusiasts.
collaboration: Project Management Team,Research and Development Team

title: CPBL APP
pageTitle: CPBL APP | My Featured Projects
content: The CPBL APP is the official application of the Chinese Professional Baseball League, offering users the ability to watch live games, highlights, and replays of CPBL matches anytime and anywhere. Through this platform, users can access real-time game data, player information, and team updates, making it easy to stay updated on every match's progress, whether you're at the stadium or watching remotely.

With a user-centered approach, Chuangshih Digital Technology utilizes the latest technologies and design trends to help clients establish a strong competitive edge in the digital world.

The app features learning journey management, allowing students to track progress and achievements. Students can share insights and interact with others. The platform includes a school evaluation system for feedback, improving teaching quality. Additionally, the app tracks learning activities, helping students view past and upcoming events to boost motivation.

title: Arome Fragrance Shopping Website
pageTitle: Arome Fragrance Shopping Website | My Featured Projects
content: Arome is a dedicated shopping platform for fragrance lovers, offering a diverse range of scents for easy selection. The website features a comprehensive online store management system, including order and inventory tracking, sales monitoring, customer relationship management, and promotional campaign settings. Sellers can adjust shipping fees and payment options for seamless transactions. With data analytics and reporting, store owners can track sales trends in real time, optimize strategies, and enhance market competitiveness. Arome ensures a convenient and secure shopping experience, catering to every fragrance enthusiast’s needs.
role: UI design, UX design, Frontend Development
collaboration: Project Management Team,Research and Development Team

title: Daying Interior Design
pageTitle: Daying Interior Design | My Featured Projects
content: Daying Interior Design specializes in creating unique and comfortable residential and commercial spaces. Combining professional aesthetics with functionality, we tailor ideal environments to meet our clients’ needs. Our experienced design team seamlessly integrates modern styles with personal preferences, ensuring each project maintains both quality and practicality. From space planning and material selection to meticulous execution, we guarantee a refined and efficient design process. Whether for homes, offices, or commercial venues, Daying Interior Design is committed to delivering high-quality spaces with distinctive charm.

title: Hwa Li Holidays Travel
pageTitle: Hwa Li Holidays Travel Website | My Featured Projects
content: Hwa Li Holidays, created in partnership with China Airlines and top travel agencies, offers premium Southeast Asia travel packages for those seeking quality vacations and immersive cultural experiences. Our meticulously planned itineraries allow travelers to uncover the region’s unique charm, from cultural explorations and breathtaking landscapes to luxurious retreats. With Hwa Li Holidays, travel is more than just a journey—it’s a rewarding experience that enriches your life, turning every trip into a treasured memory.

title: MY CUBA HI
pageTitle: MY CUBA HI | My Featured Projects
content: MY CUBA HI is a rental and tour booking platform designed for exploring Havana, offering convenient day tours and car rentals for a personalized Cuban adventure. Whether you prefer self-driving through Havana’s vibrant streets or joining guided tours to experience its rich history and culture, MY CUBA HI has you covered. With a variety of vehicle options and flexible rental plans, we ensure a hassle-free journey, allowing you to fully enjoy the warmth and charm of Cuba.

title: Chinese Young Buddhist Association
pageTitle: Chinese Young Buddhist Association  | My Featured Projects
content: The Chinese Young Buddhist Association is dedicated to promoting Buddhism, fostering spiritual growth among young people, and enhancing social harmony. Through diverse Buddhist courses, meditation retreats, and community service programs, we help youth integrate Buddhist wisdom into modern life. Our platform provides learning resources and networking opportunities, encouraging young individuals to explore their inner selves, cultivate compassion and wisdom, and contribute positively to society. Whether you seek a deeper understanding of Buddhist teachings or a path to inner peace, the Chinese Young Buddhist Association is your ideal companion for growth and practice.
role: UX design, UI design, Frontend Development
tools: HTML5, CSS3, jQuery,Bootstrap, Figma, Photoshop, Illustrator

title: LEXUS CPO Taiwan Official Website
pageTitle: LEXUS CPO Taiwan Official Website  | My Featured Projects
content: The LEXUS CPO Taiwan official website offers a selection of certified pre-owned vehicles, each undergoing a rigorous 166-point inspection to ensure top quality. Enjoy factory warranty, exclusive after-sales services, and a seamless online experience with vehicle browsing, instant quotes, and test drive reservations. Experience Lexus craftsmanship and reliability with confidence on every journey.

title: Southern Hemisphere Art & Culture
pageTitle: Southern Hemisphere Art & Culture Online Event | My Featured Projects
content: The Southern Hemisphere Art & Culture Online Event invites art lovers to relive their past experiences. Participants can upload exhibition, gallery, or museum ticket stubs along with their reviews for a chance to win flight tickets to Australia. The event also introduces renowned cultural festivals such as Vivid Sydney, the Sydney Royal Easter Show, and the Sydney Opera on the Harbour Festival. Additionally, travelers can find helpful China Airlines flight information to Sydney, making it easier to plan an unforgettable artistic journey.

title: Evergreen Gentleman’s Night(Proposal)
pageTitle: Evergreen Gentleman’s Night Online Event (Proposal) | My Featured Projects
content: The Evergreen Gentleman’s Night is an exclusive online event designed for those who appreciate refinement and elegance. Participants can discover their ideal gentleman’s code and sign up for the Gentleman’s Secret Party. Lucky guests will get the chance to indulge in an unforgettable evening featuring gourmet cuisine, fine wine, and live jazz music. Additionally, the event introduces the Evergreen Laurel Hotel, highlighting its sophisticated atmosphere and premium services, making it the perfect destination for gentlemen seeking a distinguished lifestyle.

title: Breathe Freely in Melbourne
pageTitle: Breathe Freely in Melbourne – Online Event | My Featured Projects
content: Breathe Freely in Melbourne online event invites you to create your own Melbourne coffee map, discovering the essence of the world’s coffee capital. Once completed, you’ll receive a Louisa Coffee Australian Flat White voucher, bringing a taste of Melbourne’s coffee culture to you. Additionally, the event showcases China Airlines’ direct flights to Melbourne, offering a seamless journey to one of the world’s most livable cities, where you can experience its rich coffee heritage and relaxed urban charm firsthand.

title: Southern Villa – A Fresh Start(Proposal)
pageTitle: Southern Villa – A Fresh Start | My Featured Projects
content: Join Southern Villa’s A Fresh Start naming event! Give our newly designed banquet hall a meaningful name, and you could win a luxurious stay at Southern Villa. Designed by renowned architect Chien Hsueh-Yi, the banquet hall features a modern minimalist aesthetic blended with natural elements, creating an elegant and welcoming space for weddings, corporate events, and private gatherings. Unleash your creativity and help us name this stunning venue while embracing a fresh beginning at Southern Villa!

title: Mystic Library – Travel Master Challenge
pageTitle: Mystic Library – Travel Master Challenge | My Featured Projects
content: Discover the world with Mystic Library! Take our Facebook Travel Master Quiz and test your knowledge across Eastern Europe, Northern Europe, Western Europe, Japan, and China. Pass the challenge and enjoy a 10% discount on any Artisan Travel itinerary! Whether you're drawn to Europe's medieval castles, Japan's cultural treasures, or China's breathtaking landscapes, Mystic Library opens the door to new adventures. Test your travel expertise now and unlock exclusive rewards!

title: V Air SUPER V Ticket Challenge
pageTitle: V Air SUPER V Ticket Challenge | My Featured Projects
content: Join the SUPER V Ticket Collection Challenge and invite friends to collect tickets together! Stand a chance to win 50 V Air tickets and exclusive merchandise. Travel has never been easier—team up, compete, and embark on your dream journey. Sign up now and get ready to take off with SUPER V!

pageTitle: Tigerair Youth Declaration AR Challenge | My Featured Projects
content: Express your youthful spirit through our AR event! Share a photo with your declaration and get a free round-trip ticket or discount code. Plus, discover Tigerair’s new direct flight routes for your next adventure. Don’t miss out—travel young, travel free!

title: EVA Air Travel Addiction Challenge(Proposal)
pageTitle: EVA Air Travel Addiction Challenge | My Featured Projects
content: Watch our campaign video, test your travel addiction level, and share your results on Facebook for a chance to win EVA Air tickets! If you can’t stop dreaming about your next trip, this challenge is for you. Join now and let EVA Air take you to your next destination!

pageTitle: China Airlines A350 Direct Passenger Seminar | My Featured Projects
